_comment: This file contains metadata for the ennui-dendrita project. It is NOT hook execution configuration. Cursor should READ this file and the contents of .dendrita/ to apply reflective behavior. Hooks in .dendrita/hooks/ are behavior references, NOT executable.
_purpose: Reflective metadata for Cursor - project knowledge base

_hooks_reference._note: Hooks listed here are REFERENCES of expected behavior. NOT executable. Cursor should read these files and apply documented logic.

RepoInitialization.behavior: When detecting empty repository or unconfigured users, start interactive initialization process asking for basic data and creating user structure
RepoInitialization.trigger: .dendrita/users/ does not exist or is empty

UserPromptSubmit.behavior: When receiving user prompt, review .dendrita/skills/skill-rules.json and identify relevant skills based on keywords and intentPatterns. Consider active user profile.

PostToolUse.behavior: After editing files, identify context (project, practice, mode) and maintain record of affected context

_users_system._note: User and profile system allows customizing Cursor behavior according to user and active workspace

profile_activation.workspace_based: Check workspace-defaults.json for workspace default profile
profile_activation.default_profile: Use user profile.json if no workspace profile exists
profile_activation.manual_activation: User can request activating specific profile
